title: 4 Easy Ways to Print to PDF: Save Web Pages, Files, & More

steps.title: Navigate to the content, file, or web page you want to save.
steps.content: Navigate to the content, file, or web page you want to save. You can convert just about any type of document to the PDF format by "printing" the file to a virtual printer. This also works to save a copy of a website if you need to reference it without Internet access. This is different from printing documents with your printer, though you can still print a physical copy of the PDF later if needed.

steps.title: Press Ctrl+P.
steps.content: Press Ctrl + P . This will open the Print menu.

steps.title: Click the "Destination" drop-down menu.
steps.content: Click the "Destination" drop-down menu. You'll see a list of available printers and other destinations.

steps.title: Click Microsoft Print to PDF.
steps.content: Click Microsoft Print to PDF . This will be listed in the drop-down menu. If you don't see this option, do the following to enable it: Open the Start menu. Type "turn windows features on or off". Click the first option. Check the box next to Microsoft Print to PDF . Click OK . On certain browsers, you can also select Save as PDF or similar; this functions the same way.

steps.title: Click Print.
steps.content: Click Print . This is the button at the bottom of the screen. A new window will open.

steps.title: Select a save location and click Save.
steps.content: Select a save location and click Save . The content, file, or web page will be saved to the designated location as a PDF file.

steps.title: Navigate to the content, file, or web page you want to save.
steps.content: Navigate to the content, file, or web page you want to save. This could be a Google Sheets file, a recipe on a website, or content in another program. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press ⌘ Command+P.
steps.content: Press ⌘ Command + P . This will open the Print menu.

steps.title: Click the down arrow next to "PDF".
steps.content: Click the down arrow next to "PDF". You'll see a list of options.

steps.title: Select Save as PDF.
steps.content: Select Save as PDF . This will change the content into PDF format.

steps.title: Click Print.
steps.content: Click Print . This is the button at the bottom of the screen. A new window will open.

steps.title: Select a save location and click Save.
steps.content: Select a save location and click Save . The content, file, or web page will be saved to the designated location as a PDF file. You can also enter information such as the Title, Subject, and Keywords to make the file easier to find later.

steps.title: Open a webpage in Safari.
steps.content: Open a webpage in Safari. You can turn web pages into a PDF file and save it to the Files app . You can also email it or share it in another app.

steps.title: Tap the "Share" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "Share" icon. This is at the bottom of the screen. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Options.
steps.content: Tap Options . You can find this towards the top of the pop-up menu, underneath the website name.

steps.title: Select PDF and tap Done.
steps.content: Select PDF and tap Done . The webpage will be converted into a PDF file and can now be shared or saved.

steps.title: Tap Save to Files.
steps.content: Tap Save to Files . Alternatively, you can select an app on the list to share via Messages , Mail , or another app.

steps.title: Select a save location and tap Save.
steps.content: Select a save location and tap Save . The PDF will be saved to the Files app. If you selected an app, select the location or recipient, and then send it.

steps.title: Open a webpage in the Google Chrome app.
steps.content: Open a webpage in the Google Chrome app. This browser app allows you to save any webpage as a PDF file.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . You can find this in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Select Save as PDF.
steps.content: Select Save as PDF . On some devices, you may need to tap the Share icon first.

steps.title: Select a save location and tap Save.
steps.content: Select a save location and tap Save . The PDF will be saved to your Android. In most cases, you can find PDF files in the Documents folder.
